Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>Did you not hear me? My fault entirely.


<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0901><clr:ffff>The <clr:0000>legendary sword <clr:ffff>is meant for a
chosen one, like me.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hang on. You're still there?


You didn't happen to...<sp:5:0:0>overhear what
I was just saying, did you?
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>Hold on there. You didn't happen to...
hear what I was saying, did you?
Talk_0071:
<snd:Sleep>Sorelia...<sp:5:0:0> I'll protect you...<sp:5:0:0>
something-something woods...<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff>...
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>From what I've learned so far, a
<clr:0000>legendary sword <clr:ffff>exists somewhere
in Hyrule.
And it's highly likely to be found in the
<clr:0000>something-something woods<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>So, that much I know, but where might
woods of a something-something
nature be?
I have to find the sword soon and return
to my wife, Sorelia, at Lakeside Stable.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Please, forgive me. I went to great trouble
to learn about the <clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff> that
can defeat any monster.
If I sounded unwelcoming in the slightest,
it's only because I find myself on a
personal journey of some urgency.
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>I must protect my dear wife, Sorelia, from
any and all harm.

To do that, I must find that sword in the
<clr:0000>something-something woods<clr:ffff> soon. Only
then may I return to my wife's side!
Talk_0060:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>I've been so focused on searching for the
<clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff> that I've neglected to
find my way to a proper bath in a while.
So, this rain is good for washing away
the sweat...<sp:5:1:0> Quite nice, really.
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Ah, I shared more than I should have. But
I needn't fear. It...doesn't seem like a
<clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff> is part of your destiny.
Talk_0061:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>What fine weather, perfect for searching
the land for the <clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0074:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Nice weather, eh? Perfect for finding a
<clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff> replacement.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>So, if I gather my thoughts, what I know is this...


The <clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff> is more than fable and far
closer to fact.

Can it truly defeat any monster? Does it truly exist
in Hyrule? Yes and yes.

And it's highly likely to be found in the
<clr:0000>something-something woods<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Ha, well... <sp:5:0:0>You heard. I thought as much.<sp:5:0:0>
But I have nothing to fear.

I stand comforted that only the chosen
one can wield the <clr:0000>legendary sword <clr:ffff>that
defeats any monster.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>The chosen one isn't an eavesdropper.
He is an eave that is perfectly fine with
being dropped in on. Me, I mean.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Ah, let me share this openly... <sp:5:0:0>Some
days ago, I bid farewell to my dear wife,
Sorelia, to set out from Lakeside Stable.
I find myself now at this stable, but the
<clr:0000>something-something woods<clr:ffff> that I
seek is still far away.
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>So, forgive me if I have no more time
for eavesdroppers. I have to find the
legendary sword to protect my dear wife.
Talk_0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Ah, no. But it can't be. Y-you're
joking, right?

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>But...<sp:5:0:0>uh...<sp:5:0:0>is it?<sp:5:0:0> It is.<sp:5:0:0> The sword of legend.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>


<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I... <clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>I see...<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff> So, you got to it first.


And the fact that you're wielding
the sword means that YOU are the
chosen one.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>All right, then!<sp:5:0:0> Let it be known that you
are an important person, <sp:5:0:0>because the
legendary sword protects such persons!
Now, I must protect my important wife,
Sorelia!<sp:5:0:0> I vow to get a worthy weapon in
place of the legendary sword!
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_00>Ah! Not a word of it? Well then...


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Please, forgive me. I went to great trouble
to learn about the <clr:0000>legendary sword<clr:ffff> that
can defeat any monster.
If I sounded unwelcoming, it's only
because I find myself on a personal
journey of some urgency.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Ah, here is my story...<sp:5:0:0> Some days ago,
I bid farewell to my dear wife, Sorelia, to
set out from Lakeside Stable.
I finally reached this stable, but I seek the
<clr:0000>something-something woods <clr:ffff>that are
still far away.
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:WorkHeavy_01>I must find this legendary sword!<sp:5:1:0> I must
protect my dear wife from all danger!
Talk_0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Ah... <sp:5:0:0>I imagine that Sorelia is all alone,
waiting for my return.

I must find the legendary sword and
return to her side as soon as I can.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Tell me, you. How long have you
been there?

You didn't happen to...<sp:5:0:0>overhear what
I was just saying, did you?
Talk_0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>You were the one to be entrusted with
the legendary sword!<sp:5:0:0> That sword protects
important people.
So, I will be the one to protect my
important wife, Sorelia!<sp:5:0:0> I vow to get a
weapon in place of the legendary sword!
